title: Controlling Quality (Lakeyah interview and more)
itunes:title: Controlling Quality (Lakeyah interview and more)
description:
Today on the show we had newest artist of Quality Control Lakeyah and Ceo of the company Peirre Thomas come in where they spoke about signing on to QC, putting her stamp on the female rap game and more. Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the Boyton Beach committee for removing Latosha Clemons one of the two former Black firefighters from a mural honoring the city's past.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had newest artist of Quality Control Lakeyah and Ceo of the company Peirre Thomas come in where they spoke about signing on to QC, putting her stamp on the female rap game and more. Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the Boyton Beach committee for removing Latosha Clemons one of the two former Black firefighters from a mural honoring the city's past.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
